# awesome-grid



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                        | Type     | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `columnGap` | `column-gap` | The gap between each column.                                                                                       | `string` | `undefined` |
| `columns`   | `columns`    | The column definitions. It receives a string defines the size of each column, split by space. eg. 1fr 2fr 50px 1fr | `string` | `undefined` |
| `rowGap`    | `row-gap`    | The gap between each row.                                                                                          | `string` | `undefined` |
| `rows`      | `rows`       | The row definitions. It receives a string defines the size of each row, split by space. eg. 1fr 2fr 50px 1fr       | `string` | `undefined` |
